Script.EP1: くそっ！
Meaning.EP1: Shit!

Script.EP1: その傷で よくやるもんだ
Meaning.EP1: You fought quite well, considering your wounds.

Script.EP1: きっと彼らは
Meaning.EP1: They must've realized it

Script.EP1: 一目 見て 分かったはずだ
Meaning.EP1: the moment they saw each other.

Script.EP1: ２人は 初めて出会うより 以前から…
Meaning.EP1: That long before they had ever met,

Script.EP1: ああなる運命だったんだろう
Meaning.EP1: this destiny awaited them.

Script.EP1: すれ違っていたわけでもない
Meaning.EP1: They were not like ships passing in the night.

Script.EP1: 彼らは 誰よりも深く お互いを理解し
Meaning.EP1: They understood each other better than anyone else,

Script.EP1: 相手のことだけを 見詰めていた
Meaning.EP1: and each was focused solely on the other.

Script.EP1: お前は 狡噛 慎也(しんや)だ
Meaning.EP1: You are Shinya Kogami.

Script.EP1: お前は 槙島 聖護(しょうご)だ
Meaning.EP1: You are Shogo Makishima!

Script.EP1: こちらは 公安局刑事課です
Meaning.EP1: This is the Criminal Investigation Department, part of the Public Safety Bureau.

Script.EP1: 現在 この区画は 安全のために 立ち入りが制限されています
Meaning.EP1: Access to this block is currently restricted to ensure safety.

Script.EP1: 近隣住民の皆さんは 速やかに 退去してください
Meaning.EP1: Neighborhood residents are expected to evacuate immediately.

Script.EP1: 繰り返し お伝えします
Meaning.EP1: I repeat.

Script.EP1: こちらは 公安局刑事課です
Meaning.EP1: This is the Criminal Investigation Department, part of the Public Safety Bureau.

Script.EP1: 現在 この区画は 安全のために 立ち入りが制限されています
Meaning.EP1: Access to this block is currently restricted to ensure safety.

Script.EP1: す… すいません！
Meaning.EP1: I-I'm sorry! Neighborhood residents are expected to evacuate immediately.

Script.EP1: あの 監視官の宜野座(ぎのざ)さんでしょうか？
Meaning.EP1: Excuse me! Are you Inspector Ginoza?!

Script.EP1: 俺だ
Meaning.EP1: That's me.

Script.EP1: 配属早々に事件とは 災難だったな
Meaning.EP1: What bad luck that you have to deal with an incident right after you got posted.

Script.EP1: 本日付けで 刑事課に 配属になりました
Meaning.EP1: I've been assigned to the Criminal Investigation Department as of today!

Script.EP1: 常守(つねもり) 朱です どうぞ よろしく…
Meaning.EP1: I'm Akane Tsunemori. Pleased to meet--

Script.EP1: 悪いが 刑事課の人手不足は 深刻でね
Meaning.EP1: Sorry, but the CID is very short on manpower.

Script.EP1: 新米扱いはしていられない
Meaning.EP1: So I can't treat you like a newbie.

Script.EP1: 対象は 大倉(おおくら) 信夫(のぶお)
Meaning.EP1: Our target is Nobuo Okura.

Script.EP1: 街頭スキャナーで 色相チェックに 引っ掛かり
Meaning.EP1: A street scanner flagged him while doing a Hue Check,

Script.EP1: セキュリティードローンが セラピーを要求したが拒絶して 逃亡
Meaning.EP1: so a Security Drone ordered him to receive therapy, but he refused and ran.

Script.EP1: 記録したサイコパスは フォレストグリーン
Meaning.EP1: The Psycho-Pass it recorded for him was forest green.

Script.EP1: 高い攻撃性と強迫観念が 予想される
Meaning.EP1: His aggression and compulsion are expected to be high.

Script.EP1: そんなに 色相が濁るまで 治療を受けなかったなんて…
Meaning.EP1: To think that he didn't receive treatment and let his Hue get so cloudy...

Script.EP1: 不適合薬物に 手を出した可能性もある
Meaning.EP1: There's also a possibility that he used incompatible drugs.

Script.EP1: 何にせよ シビュラ判定を 待つまでもない 潜在犯だ
Meaning.EP1: In any case, he's a latent criminal, one far enough gone that we don't need to wait for Sibyl Judgment.

Script.EP1: 厄介なのは 大倉が逃げ込んだ― このブロックだ
Meaning.EP1: The hassle is that the place Okura ran to... is this block.

Script.EP1: 廃棄区画で 中継器がないため
Meaning.EP1: Since this is an abolition block, there's no relay device,

Script.EP1: ドローンが 進入できない
Meaning.EP1: so Drones can't come in.

Script.EP1: それと 逃亡の途中で 大倉は
Meaning.EP1: In addition... I heard Okura abducted a passerby and is holding her hostage.

Script.EP1: 通行人を拉致して 人質にしているらしい
Meaning.EP1: I heard Okura abducted a passerby and is holding her hostage.

Script.EP1: 人質が？
Meaning.EP1: A hostage?!

Script.EP1: 目撃者の証言によれば 若い女性だそうだ
Meaning.EP1: According to a witness, it's a young woman.

Script.EP1: 身元の確認は まだ 取れていない
Meaning.EP1: We still haven't been able to confirm her identity yet.

Script.EP1: 住民の退去は？
Meaning.EP1: What about the residents' evacuation?

Script.EP1: 登録上は 無人区画だが
Meaning.EP1: Records state that this is an uninhabited block,

Script.EP1: おかげで 浮浪者の巣窟だ
Meaning.EP1: but because of that, it's become a den of homeless people.

Script.EP1: 覚悟しておけ
Meaning.EP1: Be prepared.

Script.EP1: 護送車…
Meaning.EP1: A prisoner transport vehicle...

Script.EP1: これから 会う連中を― 同じ人間と思うな
Meaning.EP1: Don't think that the guys you're about to meet are humans like us.

Script.EP1: やつらは サイコパスの犯罪係数が 規定値を超えた 人格破綻者だ―
Meaning.EP1: Their Psycho-Pass Crime Coefficients exceeded a specified value. They are people of disreputable character.

Script.EP1: 本来ならば 潜在犯として 隔離されるべきところを
Meaning.EP1: Normally, they would be completely isolated as latent criminals.

Script.EP1: ただ一つ 許可された社会活動として
Meaning.EP1: However, they're allowed into the outside world

Script.EP1: 同じ犯罪者を 駆り立てる役目を与えられた
Meaning.EP1: for the sole purpose of flushing out criminals just like themselves.

Script.EP1: やつらは 猟犬― 獣を狩るための 獣だ
Meaning.EP1: They're hunting dogs. They're beasts used to hunt beasts.

Script.EP1: それが 執行官 君が 預かる部下たちだ
Meaning.EP1: They're what we call, "Enforcers." They'll be your subordinates.

Script.EP1: そっちの かわい子ちゃんが 噂の新入りさんっすか？ ギノさん
Meaning.EP1: Is that cutie the newbie that people have been talking about, Gino?

Script.EP1: 常守 朱 監視官だ
Meaning.EP1: This is Inspector Akane Tsunemori.

Script.EP1: 今日から 貴様らにとって ２人目の飼い主になる
Meaning.EP1: From today on, she's your second owner.

Script.EP1: よ… よろしくお願いします！
Meaning.EP1: P-Pleased to meet you!

Script.EP1: 全員 対象のデータには 目を通してあるな？
Meaning.EP1: You guys all looked through the target's data, right?

Script.EP1: 今から 袋のねずみを さらに 締めつぶす
Meaning.EP1: We're gonna tighten the noose on the cornered rat.

Script.EP1: 二手に分かれて 順繰りに行く
Meaning.EP1: We'll divide into two groups and take turns.

Script.EP1: 六合塚(くにづか)と縢は 俺と来い
Meaning.EP1: Kunizuka and Kagari, come with me.

Script.EP1: あとの２人は…
Meaning.EP1: The other two...

Script.EP1: 常守 監視官に 同伴しろ
Meaning.EP1: accompany Inspector Tsunemori.

Script.EP1: 了解
Meaning.EP1: Roger.

Script.EP1: ええっ？ 俺は かわい子ちゃんと 一緒がいいっす！
Meaning.EP1: What?! I wanna go with the cutie!

Script.EP1: ゲッ… ツッコミなしとか マジ ありえねえ
Meaning.EP1: Geez, no comeback? Seriously, he's unbelievable.

Script.EP1: スベってるのよ
Meaning.EP1: It wasn't funny, that's why.

Script.EP1: まったね～！
Meaning.EP1: Later!

Script.EP1: えっと… あの どうすれば？
Meaning.EP1: Well... um... What should I do?

Script.EP1: あんたが 待機を命令してくれれば― それで 何の問題もないんだが
Meaning.EP1: You could order us to stand by. We wouldn't have any problems with that.

Script.EP1: 給料泥棒は やめときな とっつあん
Meaning.EP1: You oughta earn your paycheck, pops.

Script.EP1: まあ そう緊張しなさんな お嬢さん
Meaning.EP1: Well, don't get so nervous, young lady.

Script.EP1: ドミネーターの扱いは 分かるよな？
Meaning.EP1: You know how to use a Dominator, right?

Script.EP1: い… 一応 研修は…
Meaning.EP1: I-I did receive training on it, more or less...

Script.EP1: こいつは 狙った相手の サイコパスを読み取る銃だ
Meaning.EP1: This is a gun that reads the Psycho-Pass of the target you're aiming at.

Script.EP1: 相手が 潜在犯だった場合のみ セーフティーが 解除される
Meaning.EP1: Its safety is released only when the target is a latent criminal.

Script.EP1: 全部 ドミネーターの 言いなりになって― 撃てと言われた相手を 撃ちゃいい
Meaning.EP1: You can just do what the Dominator tells you. If it says shoot, then just shoot.

Script.EP1: 撃てばいいって…
Meaning.EP1: "Just shoot"...?

Script.EP1: 基本モードなら パラライザーだ
Meaning.EP1: If it's set to basic mode, it'll use Paralyzer.

Script.EP1: 撃たれても 動けなくなるだけだから
Meaning.EP1: It'll only paralyze the target,

Script.EP1: それで 身柄確保して 一件落着
Meaning.EP1: so we'll take them into custody and that'll be case closed.

Script.EP1: 何 難しく考えることはない
Meaning.EP1: Well, you don't have to take it too seriously.

Script.EP1: 携帯型 心理診断
Meaning.EP1: Dominator Portable Psychological Diagnosis and Suppression System

Script.EP1: 鎮圧執行システム･ドミネーター 起動しました
Meaning.EP1: Dominator Portable Psychological Diagnosis and Suppression System has been activated.

Script.EP1: ユーザー認証 常守 朱 監視官
Meaning.EP1: User authentication, Inspector Akane Tsunemori.

Script.EP1: 公安局刑事課 所属 使用許諾 確認
Meaning.EP1: Affiliation. Public Safety Bureau, Criminal Investigation Department. Dominator usage approval confirmed.

Script.EP1: 適正ユーザーです
Meaning.EP1: You are a valid user.

Script.EP1: あ～ それな 指向性音声だから― 握ってる あんたにしか 聞こえんよ
Meaning.EP1: Oh that... It's a directional voice, so only the person holding it can hear it.

Script.EP1: 気にするな 最初は 小うるさいだろうが
Meaning.EP1: Don't worry about it. It might be annoying at first, but you'll get used to it soon.

Script.EP1: そのうち 慣れる
Meaning.EP1: It might be annoying at first, but you'll get used to it soon.

Script.EP1: ブリーフィングは…
Meaning.EP1: What about briefing...?

Script.EP1: 段取りの打ち合わせとか しないんでしょうか？
Meaning.EP1: Aren't we going to have a meeting to discuss a plan?

Script.EP1: 俺たちが 獲物を狩り あんたが 見届ける それだけのことだ
Meaning.EP1: We'll hunt the prey and you'll observe. That's all there is to it.

Script.EP1: いや もうちょっと 具体的に…
Meaning.EP1: Um, a bit more in detail...

Script.EP1: まあ 任せとけってことだ
Meaning.EP1: Well, he's saying, leave it to us.

Script.EP1: 俺たちも こう見えても 専門家だからな
Meaning.EP1: We may not look it, but we're experts, so...

Script.EP1: 俺たちには 俺たちの流儀がある
Meaning.EP1: We have our own way of doing things.

Script.EP1: だが その責任を負うのは 監視官である あんただ
Meaning.EP1: But the one who's responsible for our actions is you, the Inspector.

Script.EP1: だから 俺のやり口が 気に入らないときは― そいつで 俺を撃て
Meaning.EP1: So when you don't like how I do things, shoot me with that.

Script.EP1: なっ…
Meaning.EP1: Wha...

Script.EP1: 俺たちも 対象と同じ 潜在犯だ
Meaning.EP1: We're latent criminals, too, just like the target.

Script.EP1: ドミネーターは 作動する
Meaning.EP1: The Dominator will work on us, as well.

Script.EP1: あ～ 紹介が遅れたな
Meaning.EP1: Oh, we haven't introduced ourselves yet.

Script.EP1: あの とうへんぼくは 狡噛 慎也
Meaning.EP1: That stubborn fool is Shinya Kogami.

Script.EP1: でもって 俺は 征陸 智己(ともみ)
Meaning.EP1: And, I'm Tomomi Masaoka.

Script.EP1: よろしく頼むよ お嬢さん
Meaning.EP1: I look forward to working with you, young lady.

Script.EP1: は… はあ…
Meaning.EP1: Y-Yes...

Script.EP1: さて じゃあ 行くかね
Meaning.EP1: Well then, shall we go?

Script.EP1: 俺はな 今日まで 誰よりも 真面目にやってきた
Meaning.EP1: Up until today, I've lived a more earnest life than anyone.

Script.EP1: 誰も怒らせないように 誰の迷惑にもならないように
Meaning.EP1: All my life, I've been walking on thin ice, trying my best

Script.EP1: おびえて ビクビクしながら 精いっぱい やってきた
Meaning.EP1: so that I wouldn't upset anyone or be a bother to anyone.

Script.EP1: なのに たった１回 検知器に引っ掛かっただけで
Meaning.EP1: And yet, a detector finds a problem on me just once, and BOOM!

Script.EP1: もう 犯罪者扱いだ
Meaning.EP1: They already treat me like I'm a criminal.

Script.EP1: もう おしまいだ こうなっちまったら 最後
Meaning.EP1: This is it for me. Now that it's come to this, it's all over.

Script.EP1: 就職も結婚も 望みなんか ありゃしねえ
Meaning.EP1: Employment, marriage... They're impossible now.

Script.EP1: ヘッ ヘッ だったらいいさ！
Meaning.EP1: Well, fine then. I've restrained myself all this time.

Script.EP1: これまで 我慢してきた分 好き放題にやってやる！
Meaning.EP1: Well, fine then. I've restrained myself all this time. So now, I'll just do whatever I want. I'll take whatever I want!

Script.EP1: 欲しい物は ぶん取る！
Meaning.EP1: So now, I'll just do whatever I want. I'll take whatever I want!

Script.EP1: 気に入らねえやつは ぶち殺す！
Meaning.EP1: I'll kill anyone I don't like!

Script.EP1: や… やめて…
Meaning.EP1: P-Please don't.

Script.EP1: あんたみてえな カワイイ女
Meaning.EP1: I've always wanted...

Script.EP1: 一度でいいから 抱いてみたいと思ってたのさ
Meaning.EP1: to have sex with a pretty woman like you at least once...

Script.EP1: バーチャルじゃねえ 本物の肉の女をな
Meaning.EP1: with a real, flesh-and-blood woman, not a virtual one.

Script.EP1: 狡噛さん どこ 行っちゃったんでしょう？
Meaning.EP1: I wonder where Mr. Kogami went.

Script.EP1: 犯罪係数 アンダー60
Meaning.EP1: Crime Coefficient is under 60.

Script.EP1: 執行対象ではありません
Meaning.EP1: Not a target for enforcement action.

Script.EP1: トリガーを ロックします
Meaning.EP1: The trigger will be locked.

Script.EP1: 犯罪係数 オーバー120
Meaning.EP1: Crime Coefficient is over 120.

Script.EP1: 刑事課登録 執行官 任意執行対象です
Meaning.EP1: An Enforcer registered at the Criminal Investigation Department. He's an Enforce At Will target.

Script.EP1: セーフティーを解除します
Meaning.EP1: The safety will be released.

Script.EP1: 本当に 潜在犯なんだ この人も…
Meaning.EP1: So he really is a latent criminal, too...

Script.EP1: あんなに 普通に しゃべってたのに
Meaning.EP1: despite the fact that he sounded pretty normal.

Script.EP1: お嬢ちゃんの噂は 聞いてるぜ
Meaning.EP1: I've heard rumors about you.

Script.EP1: 訓練所じゃ 首席だったそうじゃないか
Meaning.EP1: I hear that you were the top student at the training school.

Script.EP1: ええ まあ…
Meaning.EP1: Well, kinda...

Script.EP1: （征陸）老婆心で言っとくが
Meaning.EP1: I'll give you a piece of friendly advice.

Script.EP1: あそこで教わったことは 全部 忘れた方がいい
Meaning.EP1: You should forget about everything you learned there.

Script.EP1: 現場じゃ 何の役にも立たんよ
Meaning.EP1: None of that stuff is helpful when you actually work on a case.

Script.EP1: 理不尽だと思うかい？
Meaning.EP1: You think that's unreasonable?

Script.EP1: ところがな そもそも俺たちの仕事ってのは 理不尽の塊なんだ
Meaning.EP1: But you know, our work is made up of unreasonable things in the first place.

Script.EP1: 誰が 何を思い 何を願うのか
Meaning.EP1: What a person thinks, or what they wish for...

Script.EP1: 人の心の全てが 機械で 見通せる時代だってのに
Meaning.EP1: We live in a time where everything in a person's mind can be made transparent by machines,

Script.EP1: それでも 誰かを 憎んだり だましたり 傷つけようとする連中が わんさと いる
Meaning.EP1: and yet, there are tons of people who'd detest, deceive or try to hurt others.

Script.EP1: これが 理不尽じゃなくて 何なんだ？
Meaning.EP1: If that's not "unreasonable," what else would you call it?

Script.EP1: あんたが 教わってきた事柄は 全て 理詰めのセオリーだ
Meaning.EP1: Everything you've been taught is based on theories and logic.

Script.EP1: それが どれだけ無意味なもんか すぐに 思い知る羽目になるだろうさ
Meaning.EP1: Soon, you'll likely come to realize how pointless they are.

Script.EP1: まあ 覚悟だけはしておくんだな
Meaning.EP1: Well, at least be prepared.

Script.EP1: 私は…
こちら ハウンド４
Meaning.EP1: This is Hound 4.

Script.EP1: ＫＴ(ケーティー)ビル ４階で 対象を発見 どうします？
Meaning.EP1: I found the target on the 4th floor of the KT Building. What are your orders?

Script.EP1: よし そのまま 目を離すな
Meaning.EP1: Okay, stay there and keep an eye on him.

Script.EP1: ハウンド２と俺が 包囲する
Meaning.EP1: Hound 2 and I will box him in.

Script.EP1: うん
Meaning.EP1: Okay.

Script.EP1: でも やっこさんのテンパり具合だと
Meaning.EP1: But considering how worked up he is,

Script.EP1: 人質の子が 限界っぽいっすよ？
Meaning.EP1: the hostage girl may be at the end of her rope.

Script.EP1: 俺一人で 確保 行っちゃいます？
Meaning.EP1: Shall I go in by myself and capture him?

Script.EP1: よし しくじるなよ
Meaning.EP1: Okay. Don't mess it up.

Script.EP1: 了解
Meaning.EP1: Roger.

Script.EP1: 犯罪係数 オーバー190 執行対象です
Meaning.EP1: Crime Coefficient is over 190. Target for enforcement action.

Script.EP1: おやおや 悪い子だ
Meaning.EP1: -The safety will be released. -My, my... What a bad boy.

Script.EP1: 縢 何をやっている！
Meaning.EP1: Kagari! What're you doing?!

Script.EP1: パラライザーが 効かねえ！
Meaning.EP1: The Paralyzer isn't working!

Script.EP1: 野郎 興奮剤か何か キメてやがる！
Meaning.EP1: He's on stimulants or something!

Script.EP1: 対象の脅威判定が 更新されました
Meaning.EP1: Target Threat Judgment has been updated.

Script.EP1: 執行モード リーサル･エリミネーター
Meaning.EP1: Enforcement mode is Lethal Eliminator.

Script.EP1: くそっ！
Meaning.EP1: Shit!

Script.EP1: あちゃ～
Meaning.EP1: Oh my...

Script.EP1: こ… これって…
Meaning.EP1: Th-This is...

Script.EP1: シビュラシステムのご託宣だ
Meaning.EP1: An Oracle by the Sibyl System.

Script.EP1: 大倉 信夫は もう この世に いらない人間なんだとさ
Meaning.EP1: It says that Nobuo Okura is no longer someone who's needed in this world.

Script.EP1: そんな… ただ 街頭スキャナーに 検知されただけなのに
Meaning.EP1: Oh no... Just because he was detected by a street scanner...

Script.EP1: 自分で 自分を 追い込んじまったんだろうな
Meaning.EP1: He probably drove himself into a corner.

Script.EP1: いまさら セラピーも 何も 通用しない
Meaning.EP1: Nothing, including therapy, will work on him anymore.

Script.EP1: 更生の余地なし― そう 判定されちまったんだ
Meaning.EP1: The judgment on him is that there's no room for rehabilitation.

Script.EP1: 初陣で 嫌な事件に 当たっちまったな お嬢ちゃん
Meaning.EP1: It's unfortunate that your first case is an unpleasant one, missy.

Script.EP1: 俺のサイコパス こんなに濁っちまってよ
Meaning.EP1: My Psycho-Pass has become this cloudy.

Script.EP1: もう 泥みてえじゃねえか
Meaning.EP1: Now it looks like mud.

Script.EP1: おい あんたのサイコパスも もう 俺のと そっくりじゃねえか
Meaning.EP1: Hey, your Psycho-Pass looks exactly like mine now.

Script.EP1: てめえも 俺と同類だ やつらに捕まったら 終わりだ
Meaning.EP1: You and I are alike. If they catch you, it'll be all over for you, too.

Script.EP1: 死ぬまで 一生 潜在犯として 拷問され続けるんだぜ
Meaning.EP1: You'll be tortured by them as a latent criminal for the rest of your life!

Script.EP1: とっとと片付けないと 人質の娘が ヤバいことになる
Meaning.EP1: We'd better hurry up and settle this or it'll be all over for the hostage girl.

Script.EP1: サイコハザード… ですか？
Meaning.EP1: Psycho-Hazard?

Script.EP1: ああ 犯罪係数は 伝染するからな
Meaning.EP1: Yeah. A Crime Coefficient can be contagious.

Script.EP1: 今どきの若いもんは ストレスに 耐性がないから
Meaning.EP1: Young people these days have no tolerance for stress,

Script.EP1: 暴力衝動や 強迫観念の影響を受けやすい
Meaning.EP1: so they're easily affected by violent urges and compulsions.

Script.EP1: 私 そのテーマで 論文 書きました
Meaning.EP1: I wrote a thesis on that topic.

Script.EP1: 言っとくが 明日は わが身だぞ お嬢ちゃん
Meaning.EP1: Let me tell you one thing, missy. It could happen to any of us.

Script.EP1: そもそも 俺たちが― 何で 執行官なんぞに されたのかと…
Meaning.EP1: The reason we were made Enforcers in the first place is...

Script.EP1: 止まれ！
Meaning.EP1: Stop right there!

Script.EP1: あっ… 来るな～！
Meaning.EP1: Stay back!

Script.EP1: 銃を捨てろ！
Meaning.EP1: Drop your guns!

Script.EP1: 下がれ！
Meaning.EP1: Step back!

Script.EP1: 死ね！
Meaning.EP1: Die!

Script.EP1: あっ… なっ…！ 何だ こりゃ！
Meaning.EP1: W-W-What the hell is this?!

Script.EP1: ご愁傷さま
Meaning.EP1: My deepest sympathies.

Script.EP1: ハウンド３ 執行完了
Meaning.EP1: This is Hound 3. Enforcement completed.

Script.EP1: 年寄りと新米を おとりにするとは
Meaning.EP1: To think that you used an old man and a newbie as a decoy...

Script.EP1: いい根性してんな ええ？ コウ
Meaning.EP1: You've sure got some big ones, don't you, Ko?

Script.EP1: 給料分の仕事だろ とっつあん
Meaning.EP1: I was just earning my paycheck, pops.

Script.EP1: 公安局です もう 大丈夫 安心してください
Meaning.EP1: We're with the Public Safety Bureau. You're safe now. Please rest at ease.

Script.EP1: 落ち着いて！ あなたを助けに来たのよ
Meaning.EP1: Calm down! We came to rescue you!

Script.EP1: 嫌… やめて… やめて…
Meaning.EP1: No... No... Don't... Don't...

Script.EP1: 征陸さん…
Meaning.EP1: Mr. Masaoka...

Script.EP1: お嬢ちゃん
Meaning.EP1: Missy...

Script.EP1: 銃で 確かめてみろ
Meaning.EP1: check her on your gun.

Script.EP1: 犯罪係数 オーバー160 執行対象です
Meaning.EP1: Crime Coefficient is over 160. Target for enforcement action.

Script.EP1: まあ 仕方ないわな
Meaning.EP1: Well, I guess it can't be helped.

Script.EP1: やめて～！
Meaning.EP1: Stop it!

Script.EP1: 嫌っ！― 嫌～！
Meaning.EP1: No! Nooooo!

Script.EP1: 何をする！
Meaning.EP1: What're you doing?!

Script.EP1: あの人は 保護対象です！
Meaning.EP1: She's a person to be protected!

Script.EP1: そのための パラライザーだろうが！
Meaning.EP1: That's exactly why Paralyzer exists!

Script.EP1: 今すぐ 眠らせて 確保するんだ！
Meaning.EP1: We'll put her to sleep right away and take her into custody!

Script.EP1: 彼女は 混乱してるだけです！ そんな乱暴なことしなくても！
Meaning.EP1: She's just confused! You don't have to use violence on her!

Script.EP1: いいか？ ドミネーターは シビュラの目だ
Meaning.EP1: Listen. Dominators are Sibyl's eyes.

Script.EP1: この街のシステム そのものが 彼女を 脅威と判断したんだ
Meaning.EP1: This town's system itself has decided that she's a threat!

Script.EP1: その意味を考えろ！
Meaning.EP1: Think about what that means!

Script.EP1: だからって！
Meaning.EP1: So you'd shoot a victim who hasn't committed a crime yet?!

Script.EP1: 何もしてない被害者を撃つなんて そんなの納得できません！
Meaning.EP1: So you'd shoot a victim who hasn't committed a crime yet?! I can't accept that!

Script.EP1: 来ないで… もう 近寄らないで…
Meaning.EP1: Stay away... Don't come any closer.

Script.EP1: もう やめて…
Meaning.EP1: Stop it already...

Script.EP1: あっ！ もう… もう… もう 来んなよ！
Meaning.EP1: I-I said stay away!

Script.EP1: 狡噛さん…
Meaning.EP1: Mr. Kogami...!

Script.EP1: やめてください
Meaning.EP1: Please don't.

Script.EP1: お願いです
Meaning.EP1: Please...!

Script.EP1: 彼女は 被害者で…
Meaning.EP1: She's the victim here and...

Script.EP1: 対象の脅威判定が 更新されました
Meaning.EP1: Target Threat Judgment has been updated.

Script.EP1: 執行モード リーサル･エリミネーター
Meaning.EP1: Enforcement mode is Lethal Eliminator.

Script.EP1: 慎重に 照準を定め 対象を排除してください
Meaning.EP1: Aim carefully and eliminate the target.

Script.EP1: そんな…
Meaning.EP1: No...

Script.EP1: やめて～！
Meaning.EP1: Don't!

Script.EP1: もう やめて そのライターを捨てて
Meaning.EP1: Stop it now. Throw that lighter away.

Script.EP1: でないと… この銃が あなたを殺しちゃう
Meaning.EP1: Or... this gun will kill you.

Script.EP1: お願い あなたを助けたいの！
Meaning.EP1: Please...! I wanna help you!

Script.EP1: だから ライターを捨てて
Meaning.EP1: So throw that lighter away.

Script.EP1: 対象の脅威判定が 更新されました
Meaning.EP1: Target Threat Judgment has been updated.

Script.EP1: 執行モード ノンリーサル･パラライザー
Meaning.EP1: Enforcement mode is Non-Lethal Paralyzer.

Script.EP1: 落ち着いて 照準を定め 対象を制圧してください
Meaning.EP1: Aim calmly and bring the target under control.

Script.EP1: 常守 監視官 君の状況判断については
Meaning.EP1: Inspector Tsunemori. I'll expect you to thoroughly explain your handling of this situation in the report.

Script.EP1: 報告書で きっちりと説明してもらう
Meaning.EP1: I'll expect you to thoroughly explain your handling of this situation in the report.

Script.EP1: こりゃ… とんでもない新人が 来ちまったもんだな
Meaning.EP1: This newbie we got sure is a piece of work...
